messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

check if approved by pm wednesday march action required entries hi clicked approved then couple minutes ago checked sheet approved tried weird error forgot card approved pm level wednesday march action required entries task application take action links actions approve reject entries details assignee assigned date task number recommended actions entries card details card period status submitted card comments reported type code location task details location details days comments totals mon wed sat cost regular satisfaction programme cost regular soft skills training cost regular satisfaction programme cost regular satisfaction programme daily totals calculated type code location task details location details days comments totals mon wed sat cost regular satisfaction programme cost regular soft skills training cost regular satisfaction programme cost regular satisfaction programme daily totals related links comments display history updated by action performed assignee updated assigned assigned assigned assigned assigned assigned
